caption.title: Results of mediation tests from structural equation modeling (SEM) analysis based on data without approximated standard deviations.
caption.p: C statistic and associated p-value for SEM without the path from biodiversity or abundance to decomposition for the four datasets: Stressors - Diversity, Stressors - Abundance, Nutrients - Diversity and Nutrients - Abundance. ΔAIC is the difference in AIC score between models with and without biodiversity- or abundance-mediated effects.
